title: Linear and rotational motion - connected wheels

content.question: Wheels <math alttext="A " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="B " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> are connected by a moving belt and are both free to rotate about their centers, as shown. The belt does not slip on the wheels. The radius of Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> is twice the radius of Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>. Wheel <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> has constant angular speed <math alttext="omega sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> and Wheel <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> has constant angular speed <math alttext="omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>. Which of the following correctly relates <math alttext="omega sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> and <math alttext="omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="omega sub A equals the fraction omega sub B over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="omega sub A equals omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="omega sub A equals 2 omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="omega sub A equals 4 omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="omega sub A equals 2 omega sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>ω</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
